profile.summary:
Some men see things as they are and ask "Why?". 
I dream things that never were and ask "Why not?" 

(Robert F. Kennedy)

experiences.title: Co-Founder & CEO
experiences.description:
We are using generative AI to revolutionize video production. 

Our technology takes you from zero to video in no time, by generating the copy, art and storyline for you. 

All that is left for you to do is press record and everything will automatically happen around you. 

Combining our AI with an intuitive interface makes it easy to quickly produce the videos you wish you could, without the need for complex editing or expensive production services. 

Start creating captivating, engaging videos that will wow your audience and take your business to the next level.

experiences.title: Founder
experiences.description: A boutique technology consultations company. Focusing on data, video/audio analytics, search, and AI.

experiences.title: Co-Founder & CEO
experiences.description:
Zoi.ai is an AI marketing assistant. Our technology allows businesses to acquire new clients and upsell existing customers by leveraging highly personalized and automated marketing campaigns.

Led the company from the ground up to 2500 businesses worldwide.

experiences.title: Co Founder & CEO
experiences.description:
GoTime is one of the most innovative CEM (Customer Experience Management) systems.
It is a unique software package integrating business process management, analytics, and customer flow management, orchestrated to deliver that optimal customer experience.

experiences.title: Artificial Intelligence Lead
experiences.description:
Tagdox is a document analysis company developing game-changing technology in the document space for professional services. The company enables users to analyze documents and turn content into easily accessible data.
The tags in TagDox are designed to simplify the process of identifying and structuring document information by creating automatic suggestions and content-meaning tags.

experiences.title: Search and NLP Consultant
experiences.description:
Focusing on Enterprise-Search technologies, Cluster computing and Big data pipelines.
I was consulting enterprises around the world and help them lead huge data analysis and search-based projects, integrated with state of the art open-source projects I took part in.
